reasoning: Resistant hypertension (HTN uncontrolled on 3+ antihypertensive agents) affects ~10% of hypertensive patients. Incidence ~1.5 per 100k/year, prevalence ~15,000 per 100k (subset of hypertensive population).
source: Calhoun DA et al. (2008). Resistant hypertension: diagnosis, evaluation, and treatment. Hypertension. 51(6):1403-1419
